snippet: The Institute of Medicine, a federally financed research group in Washington, has started a 15-month investigation into sports-related concussions sustained by young athletes.
abstract: Federally financed research group Institute of Medicine will conduct study on sports-related concussions in young athletes and effectiveness of protective equipment.
lead_paragraph: The Institute of Medicine, a federally financed research group in Washington, has started a 15-month investigation into sports-related concussions sustained by young athletes.

headline.seo: Institute of Medicine Studying Concussions in Young Athletes
headline.main: Institute of Medicine Studying Concussions in Young Athletes
